description: There was an issue with not using hardware acceleration but it's great anyway. I like this + the gnome extension Focus together.
Everything works with local videos and youtube urls aswell which works perfectly. Highly recommend this app if your coming from wallpaper engine
summary: Very nice replacement for wallpaper engine on gnome

description:
ITS A VIDEO OMG, IT IS MOVING OMG, I LOVE IT!

I missed having this on wayland, time to kill my battery life of my old laptop!
